text:
The manual for mod_deflate doesn't document that you can set no-gzip
to disable compression. Since this is hard to do otherwise and there
are some lame clients out there, this is something people are going
to want to know about.
creator: bruno@wolff.to
slive@apache.org
text:
I'm not exactly sure why you say that.  This page:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/mod_deflate.html
clearly documents the gzip-only-text/html env variable.
I just updated the mod_gzip doc to mention no-gzip.
creator: trawick@apache.org
